then wdym "The parser would care if it were looking to make sure that the token matched the production rule"
üòê
```NLnumber = BINARY_LITERAL {% Token(BINARY_LITERAL_ item) %}NL  | HEXADECIMAL_LITERAL {% Token(HEXADECIMAL_LITERAL_ item) %}NL  | DECIMAL_LITERAL {% Token(DECIMAL_LITERAL_ item) %}NL```
I tokenized all of the digits in a number. - together or separately
what i'm saying is the parser _doesn't need to know_ what the lexer does. it's a lot easier if you just assume the lexer is behaving correctly
